rule: Include an explanation of how the model names were extracted outside the array.
input: Abstract: The study introduces AIModel for data analysis.
validityText:
The input starts with 'Abstract: ', which is required by the input specification. It is followed by the abstract text, "The study introduces AIModel for data analysis," which is compliant with the rule that the input is a text string representing the abstract of a machine learning paper. The presence of what seems to be a model name "AIModel" is acceptable as the input may contain model names within the text. There are no language issues as the text is in English. The length of the abstract is not restricted by the specification, so the given length is acceptable. 

No violation.
OK
